sentence: The food service entrainment and surroundings were amazing
Overall we had a wonderful time and made lasting memories
Excellent atmosphere breath taking landscape
Relaxing atmosphere with spacious surroundings
we have stayed at this JW Mariot on three different occasions and have consistently had a great experience
Pool Food Staff Atmosphere was all amazing
Experience the hill country the right way then see the Alamo which is less than 30 minutes from the resort
This is the 2nd time we have stayed here and each time was an awesome experience
Very good rooms with a quite environment to enjoy your time while playing golf

What a beautiful venue the JW Mariot spa and resort in San Antonio is beautiful Hill country setting this venue is absolutely magnificent very spacious grandiose the meeting rooms are incredible so far I have had three different events at this venue and every one of them has been just spectacular the service is always good the Ambiance is amazing and the food the food for a catered type of event is just amazing
We were returning customers up until now and had not experienced these issues before
Disappointing experience over Christmas
BUT it sends me over the edge when corporations try to VIRTUE SIGNALMy experience at Mariot was ruined by your VIRTUE SIGNALING and terrible service at high prices
Now to the few negatives things we experienced
Its very sad when you pay for a 5 star hotel and get a 2 star experience

Unlike the Adult only pool which has no on site bar restaurantFolowing our most recent experience we ’ve decided to avoid the JW Mariot Hill Country at all costs and just drive up for the day when we get the urge to indulge in spa services or the guys get the urge to play golf there again
The JW Mariot was just not a place to stay but an experience
My Husband and I were really expecting a 5star Resort Experience that felt more like a crappy MOTEL
A resort that feels almost as if you are out of the country due to the size of the property and the hill country surroundings but still close enough to civilization to make a store run
See 2018 review and that will cover the experience no need to redo the post
